text: Grigorii Vasilyevich Golosov, also spelled as Grigory Golosov () is a Russian political scientist. He is a professor and the dean of Department of Political Science at European University at Saint Petersburg, Russia. He is notable as expert on political institutions and electoral systems, in particular, in application to Russia. Golosov is also a popular polytical analyst writing for media such as Forbes and polit.ru . ==Biography== Golosov was born in 1963. After his doctoral studies, from 1987 to 1995, he worked at Novosibirsk State University. ==Books== ===In English=== * Modes of Communist Rule, Democratic Transition, and Party System Formation in Four East European Countries (Donald W.
